Text:
Cast :  Abhishek Bachchan    Johnny Lever      
        Bipasha Basu         Neil Nitin Mukesh 
        Shweta Bhardwaj      Vyacheslav Razbega
        Bobby Deol           Aftab Shivdasani  
        Sonam Kapoor         Omi Vaidya        
        Vinod Khanna         Richard Whiteside 
        Sikander Kher                          



     Director    :  Abbas - Mastan             
     Writer      :  Nikhat Bhatty              


     Genre       :  Action | Drama | Thriller  




  It's time to steady your selves for the      
  biggest action extravaganza that Bollywood   
  has to offer! The dynamic director duo       
  Abbas-Mustan are back to enthrall the        
  audiences one again with the lean and        
  mean heist flick PLAYERS. The movie is the   
  official remake of the 2003 Hollywood        
  blockbuster, THE ITALIAN JOB and promises    
  to be just as much of a thrilling ride!      






  IMDB Link :

Why can't I download any torrents? I used to do it using two green arrows images against the title of torrent. Any help would be appreciated. Thank you.

@viki_90

torrents have been removed.....instead of them use magnet links....they work exactly the same as torrents...
download the magnet link,and it downloads the torrent into your computer and automatically starts it...
magnet links are more secure for the uploaders thats why piratebay is using them
